00017 #define _ArrayIndexnD_(N,index,imax,i,ghost)  \
00018   { \
00019     int arraycounter, term=1, index_copy=index; \
00020     for (arraycounter=0; arraycounter<N; arraycounter++) term *= (imax[arraycounter]+2*(ghost));\
00021     for (arraycounter=N-1; arraycounter>=0; arraycounter--) {\
00022       term /= imax[arraycounter]; \
00023       i[arraycounter] = index_copy/term; \
00024       index_copy -= i[arraycounter]*term; \
00025     } \
00026     for (arraycounter=0; arraycounter<N; arraycounter++) i[arraycounter] -= (ghost);\
00027   }

00036 #define _ArrayIndex1D_(N,imax,i,ghost,index)  \
00037   { \
00038     index = i[N-1]+(ghost); \
00039     int arraycounter; \
00040     for (arraycounter = (N)-2; arraycounter > -1; arraycounter--) { \
00041       index = ((index*(imax[arraycounter]+2*(ghost))) + (i[arraycounter]+(ghost))); \
00042     } \
00043   }

00122 #define _ArrayIncrementIndex_(N,imax,i,done) \
00123   { \
00124     int arraycounter = 0; \
00125     while (arraycounter < (N)) { \
00126       if (i[arraycounter] == imax[arraycounter]-1) { \
00127         i[arraycounter] = 0; \
00128         arraycounter++; \
00129       } else { \
00130         i[arraycounter]++; \
00131         break; \
00132       } \
00133     } \
00134     if (arraycounter == (N)) done = 1; \
00135     else          done = 0; \
00136   }

00350 #define _ArrayBlockMultiply_(x,a,n,bs) \
00351   { \
00352     int arraycounter1,arraycounter2; \
00353     for (arraycounter1=0; arraycounter1<n; arraycounter1++) { \
00354       for (arraycounter2=0; arraycounter2<bs; arraycounter2++) { \
00355         x[bs*arraycounter1+arraycounter2] *= a[arraycounter1]; \
00356       } \

00364 INLINE int    ArrayCopynD            (int,double*,double*,int*,int,int,int*,int);
00365 INLINE double ArrayMaxnD             (int,int,int*,int,int*,double*);
00366 INLINE double ArraySumSquarenD       (int,int,int*,int,int*,double*);
00367 INLINE double ArraySumAbsnD          (int,int,int*,int,int*,double*);

00370 INLINE int ArrayCopynD(int    ndims,  
00371                        double *x,     
00372                        double *y,     
00373                        int    *dim,   
00374                        int    g1,     
00375                        int    g2,     
00376                        int    *index, 
00377                        int    nvars   
00379                       )
00380 {
00381   if (!y) {
00382     fprintf(stderr,"Error in ArrayCopynD(): array \"y\" not allocated.\n");
00383     return(1);
00384   }
00385   if (!x) {
00386     fprintf(stderr,"Error in ArrayCopynD(): array \"x\" not allocated.\n");
00387     return(1);
00388   }
00389   int done = 0;
00390   _ArraySetValue_(index,ndims,0);
00391   while (!done) {
00392     int p1, p2;
00393     _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,index,g1,p1); 
00394     _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,index,g2,p2);
00395     _ArrayCopy1D_((x+p1*nvars),(y+p2*nvars),nvars);
00396     _ArrayIncrementIndex_(ndims,dim,index,done);
00397   }
00398   return(0);
00399 }
00400 
00402 INLINE double ArrayMaxnD(int    nvars,  
00404                          int    ndims,  
00405                          int    *dim,   
00406                          int    ghosts, 
00407                          int    *index, 
00408                          double *x      
00409                         )
00410 {
00411   double sum = 0;
00412   int done = 0; _ArraySetValue_(index,ndims,0);
00413   while (!done) {
00414     int p; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,index,ghosts,p);
00415     int v; 
00416     for (v=0; v<nvars; v++) {
00417       double term = ( x[p*nvars+v]>0 ? x[p*nvars+v] : -x[p*nvars+v] );
00418       if (term > sum) sum = term;
00419     }
00420     _ArrayIncrementIndex_(ndims,dim,index,done);
00421   }
00422   return(sum);
00423 }

00426 INLINE double ArraySumAbsnD(int     nvars,  
00427                             int     ndims,  
00428                             int     *dim,   
00429                             int     ghosts, 
00430                             int     *index, 
00431                             double  *x      
00432                            )
00433 {
00434   double sum = 0;
00435   int done = 0; _ArraySetValue_(index,ndims,0);
00436   while (!done) {
00437     int p; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,index,ghosts,p);
00438     int v; for (v=0; v<nvars; v++) sum += ( x[p*nvars+v]>0 ? x[p*nvars+v] : -x[p*nvars+v] );
00439     _ArrayIncrementIndex_(ndims,dim,index,done);
00440   }
00441   return(sum);
00442 }

00445 INLINE double ArraySumSquarenD(int    nvars,  
00446                                int    ndims,  
00447                                int    *dim,   
00448                                int    ghosts, 
00449                                int    *index, 
00450                                double *x      
00451                               )
00452 {
00453   double sum = 0;
00454   int done = 0; _ArraySetValue_(index,ndims,0);
00455   while (!done) {
00456     int p; _ArrayIndex1D_(ndims,dim,index,ghosts,p);
00457     int v; for (v=0; v<nvars; v++) sum += (x[p*nvars+v]*x[p*nvars+v]);
00458     _ArrayIncrementIndex_(ndims,dim,index,done);
00459   }
00460   return(sum);
